TypeSignature.Value: public interface IExtension<T> where T : IExtensibleObject<T>
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtension`1<(class System.ServiceModel.IExtensibleObject`1<!T>) T>
generic <typename T> where T : IExtensibleObject<T>public interface class IExtension

span.span: The object that participates in the custom behavior.

summary.span: 讓物件可以透過彙總 (Aggregation) 擴充另一個物件。

span.span: Enables an object to extend another object through aggregation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WCF 可讓您擴充物件 ( ， ， ，和類別) 使用其可擴充物件模式加入新狀態或行為。WCF allows you to extend objects (the , , , and classes) by adding a new state or behavior by using its extensible object pattern. 可擴充物件模式用於 WCF 搭配來擴充現有執行階段類別的新功能，或新增狀態功能到物件。The extensible object pattern is used in WCF to either extend existing run-time classes with new functionality or to add new state features to an object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Attach(!T owner) cil managed

param.name: owner
param.span: 彚總此擴充的可擴充物件。

span.span: The extensible object that aggregates this extension.

summary.span: 讓擴充物件可以找出它被彚總的時間。

span.span: Enables an extension object to find out when it has been aggregated.

summary.span: 當擴充加入至 屬性時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the extension is added to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Detach(!T owner) cil managed

param.name: owner
param.span: 彚總此擴充的可擴充物件。

span.span: The extensible object that aggregates this extension.

summary.span: 讓擴充物件可以找出它不再被彚總的時間。

span.span: Enables an object to find out when it is no longer aggregated.

summary.span: 當擴充從 屬性中移除時呼叫。

span.span: Called when an extension is removed from the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 方法來找出移除擴充的時間。Use the method to find out when the extension has been removed. 擴充可以使用這個時間，取消攔截可擴充物件上的事件。An extension can use this to unhook events on the extensible object. 擴充也可以從這個方法擲回 ，表示一旦加入，擴充便不可移除。An extension can also throw from this method to indicate that, once added, the extension cannot be removed. 請注意，當擁有者物件已處置或關閉時，就不會呼叫這個方法。Note that this method is not called when the owner object is disposed or closed. 如有需要，則由擴充或加入擴充的程式碼來攔截 (Hook) 適當的 事件，或實作適當介面 (做為 )，藉以觀察擁有者的開發週期。If needed, it is up to the extension or the code adding the extension to hook the appropriate events or implement the appropriate interfaces (for ) to observe the lifecycle of the owner.
